title: DocuSign CLM: Video Trainings & Demos
content: Overview Training: Sales Contract Process https://drive.google.com/file/d/1numTJp6EZuY37kfo0Qn3TA2V8RTzkWea/view?usp=drive_link Indexed Video Training: Core Features https://drive.google.com/file/d/1H_LGkAxkab1QduU-uLvehF_r_Vm6GQde/view?usp=drive_link 21:49 - 25:02 : Overview of collaborative editing and version control 25:03 - 31:58 : Adding and removing documents in the workflow system; comparing different versions 31:59 - 37:20 : Managing tasks (reassignment, commenting internally, counter-party review) 37:21 - 40:52 : External review of contract (recipients, additional documents, date for review, tracking on the dashboard) 40:53 - 45:26 : Recap of transition to legal review, collection of signatures, organization of the procurement folder 45:27 - 51:30 : Concluding remarks--simulating the IO process and role-playing exercise to be scheduled. Demos During Testing Phase For Sales Use Case https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EEI2APiub9fvr8Sxp1wJ5NndB1756jOE/view?usp=drive_link For All Use Cases (End-to-End Demo) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1U8nBrRBHMqBDj6u2uy5n9Sf5Pj1nWSzc/view?usp=drive_link
